Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti with a blue lappet wig with red and yellow braids, a carved brown face, a blue, red and yellow collar surrounding the brown hands in relief holding two black hoes, the body is white, the legs are inscribed with four rows of black painted hieroglyphs separated by red lines, the back is decorated with a representation of a red seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nu-pots, the back of the legs is decorated with a red mesh panel.
